dcterms:description: Hansel is a benchmark dataset for few-shot and zero-shot entity linking in simplified Chinese, derived from Wikipedia. It includes a training set and a test set that focuses on Few-Shot (FS) and Zero-Shot (ZS) settings, evaluating the model's ability to generalize to emerging and tail entities.
dcterms:title: Hansel
